row.Docu:
These actions can be used to interact with the Automic Release Automation via its webservice to perform certain operations.
One can perform simple functions like start an activity, create an activty from an activitytemplate, assign a deploymentpackage, schedule the activity and start the activity. We provide actions for every function and for some of the composite functions. These actions are written to be executed mainly from the Deployment Manager itself and not directly from within the AutomationEngine client. Therefore some settings are made directly in the variables tab and not via a PromptSet.
=Supported versions=
See http://docs.automic.com/compatibility?len=Package.DM&comp=PCK.AUTOMIC_DM&version=1.2.3
=Rollback=
These actions do not support rollback. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
=Changelog= 1.2.6 Update dependencies to PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND >= v1.1.2 1.2.5 Fix the security issue Password/Token field is in clear text => PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND v1.1.1 needs to be installed 1.2.4 Update dm-tools.jar, putting log executions to agent temp directory => PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND v1.1.0 needs to be installed 1.2.3 Fix various bugs. 1.2.2 + PCK.AUTOMIC_DM.PUB.ACTION.CUSTOMIZE_CONFIG The config file customization mechanism allows you to adapt properties in ini/java properties/xml files or to replace arbitrary string fragments in an arbitrary text file. The replacements are defined in an arbitrary namespace of the Deployement Manager. This action can be used to set passwords in config files in a protected way.
